title: Structured data has empty required fields on some sites
description:
64 URLs have JSON-LD or Microdata but with empty or missing required fields:
- mybakingaddiction.com: 48 URLs with empty recipeIngredient
- smittenkitchen.com: 6 URLs with empty recipeIngredient, 9 with empty recipeInstructions
- iamafoodblog.com: 1 URL missing name

The extraction pipeline currently rejects these entirely. Could fall back to raw HTML extraction when structured data is present but incomplete.
